channel.title: Zooscape 508 (espeon base) need help adding bolt specials
channel.description:
Yes its 2013 and im coding a 508 server XD. Well any who, I've been trying to add bolt specials like d bolt(e) specials, etc and i can't seem to figure how to add it and i finally decided to get some help, may someone please post how to add it with espeon converted version will appreciate it. Like how unforgivscape, shadowisle 508 had the bolt specials and it was a espeon base.
Thanks, -Joey
Still need help and dont say "look it up on google", this is no where to be found. :\

item.title: Zooscape 508 (espeon base) need help adding bolt specials
item.dc:creator: @joeyscape joeyscape
item.description:
@joeyscape wrote:

Lol, sorry that didn’t help bolt effects are added in Playercombat.java but for espeon base it was never add for any source but very few sources added them and no tuts were ever released. If you dont mind can you download 508 Zooscape source and can you take a look at the playercombat.java and some ints and help me add bolt specs from a tut and converting the methods to work on espeon?? :o

Read full topic
item.source: Zooscape 508 (espeon base) need help adding bolt specials

item.title: Zooscape 508 (espeon base) need help adding bolt specials
item.dc:creator: @Host_Gushers Host Gushers
item.description:
@Host_Gushers wrote:

like how u do for any other item, and to check if you have them go into Source\Data\cfg\item.cfg. In there u want to do cntrl+f and search for (e) or any word with the bolt and see if it comes up. example would be dragon_bolt. Hope i helped.

Read full topic
item.source: Zooscape 508 (espeon base) need help adding bolt specials
